title: Why is Riot so Awesome?
body:
Bit of a wird question, also a bit fanboy. 

If i was playing a match of Battlefield and was playing with or vs'ing a dev i would be like, "thats kinda cool". But if i was playing a league game with a rioter, i would probably get half my friends on Skype just so i could share my screen with them.
